<!-- ## Welcome! {.unnumbered .unlisted} -->

CSCI 0451, "Machine Learning," is an introductory course in computer science at Middlebury College. It is one of several ways in which you might begin a computer science major at Midd. It's also a great way for you to develop your computational skills to support other majors. 

You can access this page using `go/cs-451`.
